item.title: How I Got My Agent: Katherine Fleet | WritersDigest.com
item.description:
How I Got My Agent: Katherine Fleet | WritersDigest.com

"How I Got My Agent" is a recurring feature on the Guide to Literary Agents Blog, with this installment featuring Katherine Fleet, author of THE SECRET TO LETTING GO. These columns are great ways for you to learn how to find a literary agent.

item.title: How to Start a New Novel in 22 Easy Steps | WritersDigest.com
item.description:
How to Start a New Novel in 22 Easy Steps | WritersDigest.com

1. Open a new Word document. 2. Save it as tentative book title. 3. Wonder if any other books have this title 4. Check Twitter. 5. Google tentative book title. 6. Feel relieved that you're somewhat original... (Can writers query multiple agents at the same agency?)
